abstract: Mattel reports net income fell to $149.9 million in fourth quarter, down almost 60 percent, or 44 cents a share, and that its net income for 2014 fell to $498.9 million, down 45 percent, or $1.45 a share.
lead_paragraph: The toymaker, whose chief executive resigned last weekend, said net income fell nearly 60 percent in the fourth quarter.
snippet: The toymaker, whose chief executive resigned last weekend, said net income fell nearly 60 percent in the fourth quarter.

headline.main: Bleak Report For Quarter From Mattel
headline.print_headline: Bleak Report for Quarter From Mattel
